Package com.virtualbankv2.boundary

package com.virtualbankv2.boundary
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AccountInformationPage
    This class represents the GUI for displaying account information.
    AccountInformationPageTest
    This class tests the functionality of the AccountInformationPage class.
    AccountOverviewUI
    The AccountOverviewUI class is a user interface for displaying and managing user accounts.
    AccountOverviewUITest
    This class represents the GUI for displaying account overview.
    ChildLock
    Represents a child lock window for a virtual bank application.
    ChildLockTest
    This class represents the GUI for displaying child lock functionality.
    ContactUsPage
    The ContactUsPage class represents the customer service page of the Virtual Bank application.
    ContactUsPageTest
    This class tests the functionality of the ContactUsPage class.
    CreateGoalUI
    The CreateGoalUI class represents the user interface for creating a new goal in the Virtual Bank application.
    CreateGoalUITest
    This class tests the functionality of the CreateGoalUI class.
    CreateTaskPage
    CreateTaskPage class provides a user interface for creating new tasks within the Virtual Bank application.
    CreateTaskPageTest
    This class tests the functionality of the CreateTaskPage class.
    FAQ
    The FAQ class is a user interface for displaying frequently asked questions (FAQ) about the Account Management System.
    FAQTest
    This class tests the functionality of the FAQ class.
    FeatureIntroPage
    The FeatureIntroPage class extends JFrame and is used to display the feature introduction page of the Account Management System.
    FeatureIntroPageTest
    This class tests the functionality of the FeatureIntroPage class.
    GoalOverviewUI
    The GoalOverviewUI class represents the goal overview interface for the Virtual Bank application.
    GoalOverviewUITest
    This class tests the functionality of the GoalOverviewUI class.
    HomePage
    HomePage class provides a home page for the Virtual Bank application.
    HomePageTest
    This class tests the functionality of the HomePage class.
    HorizontalLineBorderTest
    This class tests the functionality of the HorizontalLineBorder class.
    InterestMessagePage
    This class represents the interest message page of the virtual bank application.
    InterestMessagePageTest
    This class tests the functionality of the InterestMessagePage class.
    LoginPage
    The LoginPage class represents the login page for the Virtual Bank application.
    LoginPageTest
    This class tests the functionality of the LoginPage class.
    OpenAccountPage
    OpenAccountPage is a GUI class that allows users to open a new account.
    Reader
    The Reader class provides methods to read data from CSV files and populate lists of various entities, such as users, accounts, transactions, tasks, goals, and support information.
    SignUpPage
    The SignUpPage class represents the sign-up page for the Virtual Bank application.
    TaskOverviewUI
    TaskOverviewUI class represents the user interface for managing tasks.
    TaskOverviewUITest
    This class tests the functionality of the TaskOverviewUI class.
    TransactionHistoryPage
    Represents a page displaying transaction history for a specific account.
    TransactionPage
    TransactionPage class represents the GUI for performing transactions.
    TransactionPageTest
    This class tests the functionality of the TransactionPage class.
    UserManual
    The UserManual class represents a GUI window that displays the user manual of the Virtual Bank application.
    UserManualTest
    This class tests the functionality of the UserManual class.
    Writer
    The Writer class is responsible for writing various data entities to CSV files.
